channel.title: NBA on Dawg & Hen
channel.description: Recent content in NBA on Dawg & Hen

item.title: Dec 16, NBA highlights
item.description: There's a rumor 5 teams pursue Caris LeVert of the Pacers. This could be a good showcase against the Pistons. No Irving. No Harden. No Harris. The slim reaper is dealing. Cade Cunningham continues improved performance. The top drafted prospect rising

item.title: Dec 15, NBA highlights
item.description: Russ got near triple-double. He helped the team to win the game and assisted the winning shot by Reaves in overtime. Russell Westbrook game and season stats Antman recorded the franchise-high 3 points shot made. All shots including missed (he barely missed today though ) and one assist Jrue Holiday had a great game against the Pacers without Giannis Gabe Vincent made a couple of big shots in the game against the 76ers.

item.title: Dec 14, NBA highlights
item.description: Scottie Barnes' great performance against the Brooklyn Nets. Short profile for SB4 Gary Trent Jr. made an effort for the win vs Nets Kessler Edwards, the rookie of the Nets, had a career-high game against the Raptors and assisted the team to win the game. Savior Precious

item.title: OffRtg for a small line-up with the center, Lebron James
item.description: When the Clippers did beat the Lakers' small line-up put LeBron James at the center postion in the 4th quarter. Many including LeBron himself criticized the bad defense LeBron says he knew he wouldn't have what he needed tonight after four straight days off. Emphasized that in the lineup with him and Melo at the 4 and 5, he was "pretty shitty" on the defensive end. But says that he was just grateful to be out there.

item.title: NBA drive leaders
item.description: NBA players with Drives per game > 12. T.J. McConnell made elite figures with 26 MP. FGM, AST%, FG% all good. Brogdon’s also impressive Ja Morant is the FGM leader for drives, Josh Giddey is the only rookie for the conditions, drives per game > 12. NBA players with Drives per game > 12. T.J. McConnell made elite figures with 26 MP. FGM, AST%, FG% all good. Brogdon's also impressive #McConnell #NBAstats pic.
